item.title: How do i make npc's give you things
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

Well this is my code for when you repair a piece of Barrows armour:

if(playerHasItem(995, 80000) && playerHasItem(4992)){ deleteItem(995, 80000); deleteItem(4992, 1); addItem(4757, 1); sM("You fix the barrow pieces."); }

You can work with that, nobody really wants to hold your hand and help you through it. Look through your server files (npchandler.java) and ctrl+f additem, and read.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc's give you things
